channel.title: Sandwhich lady random event
channel.description: I am currently working on adding the Sandwhich lady's random event. But I have added everything I need except the ability for her to randomly appear to players ingame. Looking for some advice thanks.

item.title: Sandwhich lady random event
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

I would make it with curtain skills. Like at mining you would put a way to check the chance on recieving the random event. So you make a new int and use misc.Random(10); Than you can put that in the mining method when you recieve a ore. Than you could make it check if( how you called the new int == 5){
Spawning the npc method;
}
else{ the normal mining method();
}

I know this is sloppy, but you get the idea.

Read full topic
